about_the_game:
Edge of Oblivion is a turn-based action roguelike. Face off against an ever growing horde as you battle towards the final boss. Create dynamic (and frankly absurd) builds to cleave through your foes. Think a few steps ahead and perfectly utilize your items to master the battlefield.


Blast shadows of the past with chain lightning, slash at them with swords, and don a cape made of dragon scales! No matter what items you are drawn to, craft your own playstyle through upgrades and synergies.

Key Features

  • Absurd builds: Curate a unique style of play each run
  • Bosses: Oblivion is full of bosses, ripe for the fighting, are you up for the challenge?
  • Simple turns: Each turn is simple and fast, look a few turns ahead and feel the satisfaction of utilizing your items to their best.
